alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 3:14PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS COMBINED WITH HEAVY SNOW FOR THE PRIBILOF ISLANDS LATE SATURDAY NIGHT INTO SUNDAY MORNING... A compact storm system from Siberia is forecast to track across the Pribilof Islands late Saturday night into early Sunday morning, bringing a quick round of heavy snow and strong northeasterly winds gusting as high as 35 to 45 mph. Gusty winds combined with heavy snowfall may reduce visibility to one mile or less at times due to blowing snow. The worst conditions will be brief, likely lasting around 3 hours late Saturday night. There are some model discrepancies with the exact placement and strength of the compact low, which in turn could impact the duration and intensity of blowing snow and reduced visibilities.
